structure.unit: ARTICLE XXII. PUBLIC LIBRARY ADVISORY BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-200. Limitation on powers of Board.
The Public Library Advisory Board shall have no power or authority to commit the County Government to any policies or to incur any financial obligation or to create any liability on the part of the County. No actions or recommendations of this Board shall be binding upon the County until approved or adopted by the County Commission. This Board shall not infringe upon any of the powers granted by law to any other duly constituted Board relating to matters involving Public Library facilities and services.
